```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)
library(revealjs)
```

```{r}
starch <- read_csv("kabu-daikon-starch.csv") #データフレーム名を付ける
head(starch)
names(starch)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(starch, aes(x = 横径, y = 縦径, colour = 種類)) +
  geom_point(size=5) + 
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
ggplot(starch, aes(x = 横径, y = 縦径)) +
    theme_bw() + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~種類) +
    theme(strip.background = element_blank(), 
                  strip.text = element_text(size = 15))
```
